data.title: 8 Cash-Rich Stocks for a Topsy-Turvy Market
data.text: While it’s tempting to pile your money into high-flying investments, cash-rich companies are the best stocks to buy in unpredictable markets.

data.title: Microsoft Stock Will Climb Higher on New Healthcare Catalyst
data.text:
Microsoft's new Healthcare Cloud will be a huge growth driver for the company and Microsoft stock moving forward.
The post Microsoft Stock Will Climb Higher on New Healthcare Catalyst appeared first on InvestorPlace.

data.title: Microsoft’s Cash Flow Makes It a Buy Here
data.text:
If you want to truly protect your portfolio from a recession, Microsoft stock is your best bet thanks to its solid free cash flow. 
The post Microsoft’s Cash Flow Makes It a Buy Here appeared first on InvestorPlace.
